alert.note: Alert for McCreary; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McCreary and southwestern Whitley Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pine Knot, or near Whitley City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Whitley City and Marshes Siding around 555 PM EDT. Pine Knot around 600 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hollyhill, Duckrun, Ayers, Bounty and Jellico Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
